documentation.text: @title GeneScience implements the trait calculation for new kitties

@dev set the privileged birther address
 @param _birtherAddress the new birther address
@dev Given an array of traits return the number that represent genes

@dev return the expressing traits
 @param _genes the long number expressing cat genes
@dev the function as defined in the breeding contract - as defined in CK bible
@title GeneScience implements the trait calculation for new kitties

@dev set the privileged birther address
 @param _birtherAddress the new birther address
@dev Given an array of traits return the number that represent genes

@dev return the expressing traits
 @param _genes the long number expressing cat genes
@dev the function as defined in the breeding contract - as defined in CK bible

decode(uint256).details: Parse a kitten gene and returns all of 12 "trait stack" that makes the characteristics

returns._0: the 48 traits that composes the genetic code, logically divided in stacks of 4, where only the first trait of each stack may express

encode(uint8[]).details: Given an array of traits return the number that represent genes

params._genes: the long number expressing cat genes

mixGenes(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: the function as defined in the breeding contract - as defined in CK bible
